Class Spell

extends java.lang.Object

      • calcSpellEffectValue

        public int calcSpellEffectValue(int formula,
                                int base,
                                int max,
                                int caster_level,
                                int spell_id,
                                int ticsremaining)
        0 = base 1 - 99 = base + level * formulaID 100 = base 101 = base + level / 2 102 = base + level 103 = base + level * 2 104 = base + level * 3 105 = base + level * 4 106 ? base + level * 5 107 ? min + level / 2 108 = min + level / 3 109 = min + level / 4 110 = min + level / 5 119 ? min + level / 8 121 ? min + level / 4 122 = splurt 123 ? 203 = stacking issues ? max 205 = stacking issues ? 105 0x77 = min + level / 8
        Parameters:
        formula - database value that determines which formula to use
        base - database base value
        max - database max value
        caster_level - the level of the caster
        spell_id - the spell id
        ticsremaining - remaining tics on the spell
        Returns:
        spell effect value
